title: MDENet Tool Configuration
description: The MDENet education platform tool configuration file. See https://github.com/mdenet/educationplatform/wiki/Adding-a-Tool#configuration-file for further documentation.

id.description: A unique string used for identification.

functions.description: The function object describes a tool service's function, including its file type information. The platform uses the function object to validate requests when invoking a tool function and determine if any type conversions are required prior to to its invocation.

paneldefs.description: The panel definition object specifies a panel defining each of the customisable areas. There are three classes of panel that determine a panel's primary behaviour: program, console, or output.
